About Me

Few things about me.

BIO

I am 43 years old women from Oulu. I have 3 kids and husband. I love hiking and snowboarding.

Teacher of mathematical subjects

Haukiputaan koulu

I am secondary school teacher. I teach math, physicue, chemistry and ict. My task is also to take care of our ict - equipment and help collegues with new technologies.

Innokas - trainer

Helsingin yliopisto

I am involved in Innokas. I am trainer.

Student

University of Lappenranta, Oulu, Tampere etc.

I have studied lately Python, C, C++, Html, Css, DevOps and software production. I am FiTech -student.
